languages.text: Нечестивая реликвия, сотворенная из останков неблагочестивого брата Скарикитуса, яростного провозвестника Несущих Слово.
This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.
languages.original_text: Нечестивая реликвия, сотворенная из останков неблагочестивого брата Скарикитуса, яростного провозвестника Несущих Слово.

traits.locale_text: This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.
This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.
This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.
This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.
This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.

languages.text: この不浄の遺物は、ワードベアラーたちの無慈悲な前触れであるブラザー・スカリキトゥスの遺骨から作られた。
languages.original_text: This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.

traits.locale_text: この不浄の遺物は、ワードベアラーたちの無慈悲な前触れであるブラザー・スカリキトゥスの遺骨から作られた。

languages.text: 这件邪恶的遗物是由怀言者的传道先驱，斯卡里基图斯修士的遗骸制造而成的。
languages.original_text: This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.

traits.locale_text: 这件邪恶的遗物是由怀言者的传道先驱，斯卡里基图斯修士的遗骸制造而成的。

languages.text: Cette relique impie a été créée avec le cadavre du frère Skarikitus, un impitoyable héraut des Word Bearers.
languages.original_text: This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.

traits.locale_text: Cette relique impie a été créée avec le cadavre du frère Skarikitus, un impitoyable héraut des Word Bearers.

languages.text: Esta reliquia sacrílega fue creada con los restos del hermano Skarikitus, un despiadado heraldo de los Portadores de la Palabra.
languages.original_text: This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.

traits.locale_text: Esta reliquia sacrílega fue creada con los restos del hermano Skarikitus, un despiadado heraldo de los Portadores de la Palabra.

languages.text: Dieses unheilige Relikt wurde aus den Überresten von Bruder Skarikitus geschaffen, einem unerbittlichen Herold der Word Bearer.
languages.original_text: This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.

traits.locale_text: Dieses unheilige Relikt wurde aus den Überresten von Bruder Skarikitus geschaffen, einem unerbittlichen Herold der Word Bearer.

languages.text: Bu uğursuz yadigâr, Vahyedenler'in yüreksiz müjdecisi Kardeş Skarikitus'un kalıntılarından meydana getirilmiş.
languages.original_text: This unholy relic was created from the remains of Brother Skarikitus, a remorseless harbinger of the Word Bearers.
